sentences.sContent: That is due to the matriarchy of its society.
sentences.sContent_eng: That is due to the matriarchy of its society.
sentences.sCn: 那是因为他们仍然是母系社会。

remMethod.val: matri (母亲) + archy (统治) → 母权制

words.tran: 女家长；女统治者；女负责人；受人尊敬的妇女
女家长制社会；母权制时代；母系社会

trans.tranOther: a social system in which the oldest woman controls a family and its possessions
